com.lsc.ctesterlib.crypto

Class DES

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lsc.ctesterlib.crypto.DES

  • public class DES
extends Object
    Static class with the DES algorithm implementation. All these algorithms are supported: - DES - 3DES three keys. - Retail MAC (ISO 9797 Algorithm 3 MAC)
    Author:
    dma@logossmartcard.com

    • Method Detail

      • encrypt

        public static byte[] encrypt(byte[] key,
                             byte[] iv,
                             byte[] data,
                             DES.TYPE type,
                             DES.MODE mode,
                             DES.PADDING padding)
                      throws InvalidKeyException,
                             BadPaddingException
        Encrypts data using DES or 3DES.
        Parameters:
        key: - 8-byte key if single DES, 16 or 24-byte key if 3DES.
        iv: - initialization vector, if it's null and in CBC mode, zeroes will be used. Ignored argument if in ECB mode.
        data: - data to be encrypted.
        type: - Single or triple DES.
        mode: - ECB or CBC.
        padding: - type of padding, none if it's already padded.
        Returns:
        array containing the input data encrypted.
        Throws:
        InvalidKeyException - thrown if in single DES an 8-byte key is not specified. Also if in triple DES and the key is not 16 or 24 bytes.
        BadPaddingException - if no padding is specified and the data is not multiple of 8.

      • decrypt

        public static byte[] decrypt(byte[] key,
                             byte[] iv,
                             byte[] data,
                             DES.TYPE type,
                             DES.MODE mode,
                             DES.PADDING padding)
                      throws InvalidKeyException,
                             BadPaddingException
        Decrypts data using DES or 3DES.
        Parameters:
        key: - 8-byte key if single DES, 16 or 24-byte key if 3DES.
        iv: - initialization vector, if it's null and in CBC mode, zeroes will be used. Ignored argument if in ECB mode.
        data: - data to be encrypted.
        type: - Single or triple DES.
        mode: - ECB or CBC.
        padding: - type of padding.
        Returns:
        array containing the input data encrypted.
        Throws:
        InvalidKeyException - thrown if in single DES an 8-byte key is not specified. Also if in triple DES and the key is not 16 or 24 bytes.
        BadPaddingException - if no padding is specified and the data is not multiple of 8.

      • calculateRetailMAC

        public static byte[] calculateRetailMAC(byte[] key,
                                        byte[] data)
        Implementation of the ISO-9797 Algorithm 3 MAC.
        Parameters:
        key: - key to be used.
        data: - data to be signed.
        Returns:
        8-byte MAC of the data.
